item.title: U.S. allies looking to China for deals as Trump threats them with tariffs
item.description: President Trump's tariffs and rhetoric have spurred some longtime U.S. allies to diversify their trade ties away from the U.S. Some are going cap-in-hand to Asian superpowers China and India.

item.title: Marco Rubio tells senators Venezuela transition won't be fast or easy
item.description: At his first Senate Foreign Relations Committee hearing since U.S. forces seized Nicolás Maduro, Secretary of State Marco Rubio warns the U.S. could still use force to pressure Venezuela's government.

item.title: Trump admin rewrites nuclear safety rules. And, NTSB releases findings on D.C. crash
item.description: NPR obtains documents showing the Trump administration secretly cut nuclear safety rules to fast-track new reactors. And, investigators blame systemic failures for a deadly midair crash near D.C.

item.title: Mexican president says her country has paused oil shipments to Cuba
item.description: Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum said the pause was part of general fluctuations in oil supplies and that it was a "sovereign decision" not made under pressure from the United States.

item.title: Italian officials voice outrage at the presence of U.S. ICE agents at the 2026 Olympics
item.description: U.S. Homeland Security agents provided security support at past Olympics. But after violence by ICE agents in Minneapolis, some Italian officials say an ICE unit is unwelcome in Milan Cortina.

item.title: EU signs 'mother of all deals' to boost trade with India
item.description: The European Union has signed what India's prime minister has called "the mother of all deals" to boost trade with India. For Europe, the move seeks to hedge against its unpredictable ties to the U.S.

item.title: Activists fear U.S. visa restrictions for Palestinians will hurt diplomacy
item.description: Palestinians can no longer apply for a U.S. visa with documents issued by the Palestinian Authority — another sign, they say, that the Trump administration is sidelining Palestinians.
